reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress great-looking, comfortable, and flattering, with one noting it hugs the figure in all the right places. Moreover, the quality receives positive feedback, with one customer mentioning it's perfect for newborn/family photos. However, customers disagree on the fit, with some finding it runs large. Additionally, the fabric quality and softness receive mixed reviews, with some praising the material while others find it thin and scratchy. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Flattering
items.body: Beautiful! Worked as a Christmas dress, wedding guest dress, etc. very lightweight but not see through. Also flattering and fit well while I was pregnant (until maybe late third trimester). Read more
items.author: Nate

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Order your the size you normally do.
items.body: Amazon recommended an XL , and I wasn't sure if a Large would fit my chest so I sized up for a 36DD to an XL. The XL was WAY too large for me, I could pull the mid section out about 6". I tried to belt it but it just looked bunchy. Great fit and length everywhere else. I am 5'2" 165lbs. A large would be a better fit. Across widest part of chest 42", waist 34.5". Read more
items.author: TRK

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth every penny
items.body: 12 hour delivery. Ordered at 7pm, received at 7am. Can’t beat that. For under $20 this dress is a steal. Color is true. Material feels solid and quality is great. It is even lined. I love the color. Medium was recommended but I ordered the large because I like space. That being said, I could have easily went with the medium and it would have still been comfortable. I am 5’8” ands 179-175. The dress is flattering but the style itself could be dawdy if not styled properly. What a pleasant surprise this dress is. I hope toss helps. Read more
items.author: Kindle Customer

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars It’s okay…
items.body: Very see through, it’s cute but the fabric is really thin. It’s comfortable you just can’t put your arms up. It fit me well but I don’t think I’d wear it very regularly. Read more
items.author: Optimistic reviewer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits perfectly
items.body: Love it and fits great! Read more
items.author: Kristy

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Runs HUGE!! M fits like an XL!
items.body: I literally never write reviews but had to post to save someone from purchasing this - I’m 5’4, 140lb, larger chested, typically a size medium and sometimes large in bottoms, and I was SWIMMING in this dress in size Medium. My husband said I looked like I could be in Outlander, and my best friend said I looked like an underpaid milkmaid. The stretchy part of the sleeves made to sit at your wrist and give some form, went down to my fingertips, and the length of the dress itself went to my ankles. The waist and neckline hung off of me. It looks nothing like the picture, M truly fits like an XL. Returning and searching elsewhere for a family photos dress. Read more
items.author: Olivia Pooler

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Must buy!!!
items.body: Beautiful and simple dress . I read some reviews stating that it runs too big but it’s definitely fits as described. For reference, I’m 5’4 and weight 135lb and got size small. I wish I had gotten the medium as the size chart suggested but I went with what the reviews suggested so just buy your size. The material is comfortable and stretchy. I’m definitely buying more of this dress in different colours!! Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Bad quality
items.body: Bad quality fabric, size to big for m Read more
items.author: Gricelda Gonzalez

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Maxi is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Maxi is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Blue, Army Green, Light Green, Black, Dark Green, Navy, Wine Red, Bean Paste Pink, Khaki, White, Beige, Purple, Royal Blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
